text: Ke kaloku ekubuyeni kukaMûsâ ebuyela kwabakubo, enomsindo, ekhathazekile, wathi: “Yini na ukuba nenze into engcole kangaka8 ndakungabikho, nikhawuleze nangxama na naya phambili ngokuphathelene nomcimbi weNkosi yenu? “ Waza yena wawalahla phantsi amacwecwe, wabamba umntakwabo ngeenwele wamtsalela kuye. UHârûn wathi: “Hini na mntwana kamama! Inene abantu bandithabathe njengomntu ekungekho yakhe yaye bebesele beza kundibulala, musa ke ngoko ukwenza iintshaba zigcobe ngam, ungandidibanisi kananjalo mna nabantu abangabenzi bobubi.”
